oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Concentrating on the contributions of Max Bloch, Karsten Rudolph, Meik Woyke and Walter M체hlhausen the author sums up the contributions of this volume in order to reflect on the current state of research in the field of the historiography of biographies of leading social democrats. He discusses remaining lacunae in research and develops perspectives for future research.
